EmailTemplate.name: Renewal Confirmation SCI
EmailTemplate.subject: Renewal Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Member
Many thanks for the payment of your membership renewal. The payment has now been processed and we are pleased to confirm your continued certification.
Your new certificate is available for you to download at any time from the RSPCA Members Portal.
RSPCA Assured has sent you an email invitation to the RSPCA Members Portal which details how to log in and set your unique password. Please email help@rspcaassured.org.uk if you require a copy.
Your certificate is issued by Supply Chain In-Sites Ltd our Certification Body, the SCI Certification Obligations and Conditions which apply to your on-going certification can be found here and also within the RSPCA Assured Membership agreement available here.
We will be in touch with you shortly to arrange your next assessment, information regarding assessments and the audit plan are available from our website.
Your certification status enables you to use the RSPCA Assured logo, for more information, or if you have any questions, need to make changes to your membership, or need assistance we are here to help. Please contact RSPCA Assured Membership Services on 01403 286170 or help@rspcaassured.org.uk
Yours Sincerely,
Membership Services Team RSPCA Assured
